cast.name: 斯特恩·拉斯科普洛斯 Steen Raskopoulos

writer.name: 斯特恩·拉斯科普洛斯 Steen Raskopoulos

this_title: The Record: World's Largest Biological Family
introduction: 'The Record - World's Largest Biological Family' is a black comedy written by and starring Veronica Milsom and Steen Raskopoulos. It observes the relationship between Pim & Frank Belami, who strive to maintain their world record title by attempting to fall pregnant with their 70th child.2017棕榈泉国际短片节入围短片。一对夫妇，生育了70个孩子……
foreign_title: The Record: World's Largest Biological Family
